translation.tgt_text: The cutlass was sharp but now it's jagged

translation.src_text: Vòlè-a soté lè i wè mèt kay-la
translation.tgt_text: The thief was startled when he saw the owner of the house

translation.src_text: I ka twavay bay pawen'y
translation.tgt_text: He works for his godfather

translation.src_text: Zòwyé koton bon pou dòmi
translation.tgt_text: Cotton pillows are good for sleeping

translation.src_text: I manché on pikwa
translation.tgt_text: He put a handle on a pickaxe

translation.src_text: Yo ja fini plasta kay-la
translation.tgt_text: They have already finished plastering the house

translation.src_text: Pyé pwadou-a té ka glisé pas i té ni an chay limou anlè'y
translation.tgt_text: The tree was slippery because it had much moss on it

translation.src_text: I ka galé bwa-a pou fè mèb
translation.tgt_text: He's planning the wood to make furniture

translation.src_text: Vonvon ka fè siwo myèl
translation.tgt_text: Bees make honey

translation.src_text: Nonm-lan ka twavay wèd
translation.tgt_text: The man works hard

translation.src_text: Nyès mwen malad; mwen ka alé wè'y
translation.tgt_text: My niece is sick; I'm going to see her

translation.src_text: Nonm sala twèt pasé ki
translation.tgt_text: That man is extremely treacherous

translation.src_text: Vyé mès li ka déglizé bèlté tifi sala
translation.tgt_text: Her bad manners mar that girl's beauty

translation.src_text: I wété la pou twa simenn
translation.tgt_text: He stayed there for three weeks

translation.src_text: I ankouwajé nonm-lan pou alé oti dòktè
translation.tgt_text: He encouraged the man to go to the doctor

translation.src_text: Sé moun-an vlé swiv divwa Bondyé
translation.tgt_text: The people wanted to follow God's will

translation.src_text: Davwa chay-la té lou titak, ou pa pòté'y vini
translation.tgt_text: Because the load was a little heavy, you didn't bring it

translation.src_text: Klèté sòlèy-la ka bay asou miwè-a
translation.tgt_text: The light of the sun shone on the mirror

translation.src_text: Planché kay sala pa fò
translation.tgt_text: The floor of that house is not strong

translation.src_text: Boug sala fwé paski i ni endikasyon
translation.tgt_text: That fellow is conceited because he has education

translation.src_text: Pa gadé misyé, i sé on bon jwa
translation.tgt_text: Don't be fooled by his looks, he is a good player

translation.src_text: Sé an kabawé sala papa mwen ka bwè gòg li
translation.tgt_text: It is in this bar my father drinks his liquor

translation.src_text: Lapòt-la té ouvè épi vòlè-a antwé
translation.tgt_text: The door was open and the thief entered

translation.src_text: Mannyè nonm sala abiyé-a ka moutwé i pa ni pyès gou
translation.tgt_text: The way that man dresses shows he doesn't have any taste

translation.src_text: Mwen kasé zòtèy mwen
translation.tgt_text: I broke my toe

translation.src_text: Titja-a la, 'i
translation.tgt_text: The teacher is there, yes

translation.src_text: Mwen ka ba'w tò; ou pa té sipozé bay ich moun-an kou
translation.tgt_text: I'm blaming you; you shouldn't have beat someone else's child

translation.src_text: Pòdjab! Li yonn ki ka twavay an sòlèy-la
translation.tgt_text: Poor thing! He alone has to work in the sun

translation.src_text: I désélé chouval-la
translation.tgt_text: He unsaddled the horse

translation.src_text: Mwen ka swété'w on bon Nwèl
translation.tgt_text: I wish you a merry Christmas

translation.src_text: Klèté-a bwiyan
translation.tgt_text: The light is bright

translation.src_text: Tan kannitil sé tan sòlèy-la pli cho
translation.tgt_text: The dog days are when the sun is hottest

translation.src_text: An vyéyès nou, nou ka obliyé an chay bagay
translation.tgt_text: In our old age, we forget many things

translation.src_text: Ou enmen bosé chivé'w twòp
translation.tgt_text: You like to brush your hair too much

translation.src_text: Fanmi'y té ni chagwen'y lè i alé lòt péyi
translation.tgt_text: His family couldn't do without him when he went overseas

translation.src_text: An finisman-an yo viyé san pwéson
translation.tgt_text: In the end they returned w ithout fish

translation.src_text: Nonm-lan ensilté madanm li; i kwiyé'y anyenditou
translation.tgt_text: The man insulted his wife; he called her worthless

translation.src_text: Ou pa sa dépan asou manmay jòdi-a
translation.tgt_text: You can't rely on children nowadays

translation.src_text: Ou sa konfi la si ou vlé; mwen pa mélé épi'w
translation.tgt_text: You can stay there as long as you like; I'm not going to have anything to do with you

translation.src_text: Yo ban mwen an lavi lajan
translation.tgt_text: They gave me some money

translation.src_text: Si ou pa déjanbé mwen, m'a kay pwofité
translation.tgt_text: If you don't jump over me again, I won't grow

translation.src_text: Yo kwévé dé an sé né banbou-a èk yo plen'y èk dlo
translation.tgt_text: They pierced two of the bamboo joints and filled it with water

translation.src_text: Las jwé èk flo-a; i ka twisayé mwen
translation.tgt_text: Quit playing with the styrofoam; it is giving me the shivers

translation.src_text: Mwen pa kay mété jilyé jòdi-a paski i ka fè twò cho
translation.tgt_text: I am not going to put on a waistcoat today because it is too hot

translation.src_text: Mi lalin-an la, koté zonng-lan ka jwenn èk lachè-a
translation.tgt_text: Look at the lunula there, where the nail meets with the flesh

translation.src_text: Si ou pa soumaché dité-a mwen pa kay sa bwè'y
translation.tgt_text: If you don't sweeten the tea a little, I won't be able to drink it

translation.src_text: I sèvi blan zé èk sik blan fin pou dékowé bonbon-an
translation.tgt_text: He used egg white and icing sugar to decorate the cake

translation.src_text: Yo té ni pou pasé an manng-lan pou alé bò lanmè
translation.tgt_text: They had to cross through the mangrove to get to the beach

translation.src_text: Fèy kas sé an bon afwéchi si ou vidé dlo cho anlè'y
translation.tgt_text: Cassia leaves make a good cooling if you pour hot water on it

translation.src_text: Dòktè-a djéwi boug-la
translation.tgt_text: The doctor cured the fellow

translation.src_text: Chyen mwen-an mò épi mwen téwé'y
translation.tgt_text: My dog died and I buried it

translation.src_text: Yo ègzanminé papyé-a
translation.tgt_text: They examined the paper

translation.src_text: Tout anba tab-la mik
translation.tgt_text: All under the table is damp

translation.src_text: Yo té ni ji babadin an fèt sala
translation.tgt_text: They had babadin juice at that party

translation.src_text: Tibway sala kankannèz an chay
translation.tgt_text: That boy is a big troublemaker

translation.src_text: Chapantyé-a pèd tout zouti'y
translation.tgt_text: The carpenter lost all his tools

translation.src_text: Sé moun sala té twò zélé
translation.tgt_text: Those people were too zealous

translation.src_text: Mwen enmen manjé pap lè i ka fè fwèt
translation.tgt_text: I like to eat porridge made with white flour when it is cold

translation.src_text: Van-an ka vin fò
translation.tgt_text: The wind is becoming intense

translation.src_text: Bouchonnen fyòl-la
translation.tgt_text: Put the lid on the jar

translation.src_text: Pwan sa mwen andji sa ou-a
translation.tgt_text: Take mine instead of yours

translation.src_text: Nou té jenn lè nou wivé isi
translation.tgt_text: We were young when we arrived here

translation.src_text: Apwé yo fin twavay an jaden-an yo bouwi bwapen-an asou fouyé
translation.tgt_text: After they finished working in the garden they bo iled breadfruit on a cooking fire

translation.src_text: Nou té fen, mé nou pa té ni pyès zalimèt pou pwi difé
translation.tgt_text: We were hungry but we didn't have any matches to light a fire

translation.src_text: Papa mwen ba li yon so épi i kouvè'y a tè-a
translation.tgt_text: My father threw him down and jumped on him

translation.src_text: Manjé sala ni on bou gou
translation.tgt_text: This food tastes good

translation.src_text: Yo mété senk pat fig adan bwèt-la
translation.tgt_text: They put five hands of bananas in the box

translation.src_text: Soulyé-a koupé'y dèyè talon'y
translation.tgt_text: The shoe cut him behind his heel

translation.src_text: Bètannipyé-a té adan blòk-la èk i mantjé mòdé mwen
translation.tgt_text: The centipede was in the block and it almost bit me

translation.src_text: Bò lizin-an ni dé pi
translation.tgt_text: By the factory there are two wells

translation.src_text: I ka vanné diwi-a
translation.tgt_text: She is winnowing the rice

translation.src_text: Yo té ka najé an lanmè-a
translation.tgt_text: They were swimming in the sea

translation.src_text: Lanmè-a ni an chay gwo lanm jòdi-a
translation.tgt_text: The sea has a lot of big waves today

translation.src_text: Pipirit-la pété an zòy an tèt malfini-an
translation.tgt_text: The kingbird pecked the hawk's head

translation.src_text: Nou ka alé Kastwi souvan
translation.tgt_text: We go to Castries often

translation.src_text: I tonbé asou an pyé koko épi i mantjé mò
translation.tgt_text: He fell out of a coconut tree and he almost died

translation.src_text: Ti manmay-la batizé jòdi-a mé nou ka fété fèt-la denmen
translation.tgt_text: The child was baptized today but we are holding the party tomorrow

translation.src_text: Nou woulé'y jis tan i vini toudi
translation.tgt_text: We rolled him until he got dizzy

translation.src_text: Sépawé sé moun-an an pil
translation.tgt_text: Divide the people into groups

translation.src_text: Légliz Katolik sé pli gwo lé gliz ki Sent Lisi
translation.tgt_text: The Roman Catholic Church is the biggest church in Saint Lucia

translation.src_text: Kalmason pa ka alé vit
translation.tgt_text: Snails don't go quickly

translation.src_text: Mwen pa sav koté mwen mété patjé laklé mwen
translation.tgt_text: I don't know where I put my bunch of keys

translation.src_text: Yo sèpé tout sé wazyé-a
translation.tgt_text: They cut all the bushes

translation.src_text: Pwèskè tout zabòka-a gaté
translation.tgt_text: Nearly all of the avocadoes are spoiled

translation.src_text: Tout sé moun-an konblé douvan lapòt-la ka èspéyé magazen-an ouvè
translation.tgt_text: All the people were crowding in front of the door waiting for the store to open

translation.src_text: Mwen tjébé an toutwèl an pliyan mwen
translation.tgt_text: I caught a dove in my snare

translation.src_text: I pa ka fè pwogwé
translation.tgt_text: He's not making progress

translation.src_text: Yo pa té ka palé avan mé apwézan yo tèt a tèt
translation.tgt_text: They didn't speak to each other before but now they are getting along well with each other

translation.src_text: Sé jenn jan sala ja ka fwékanté; sé sa ki fè yo nonm épi fanm kon sa
translation.tgt_text: Those young people are already sexually active; they think that makes them grown up

translation.src_text: Nou té ka pitjé sé manmay-la pou wè si yo té kay goumen
translation.tgt_text: We egged the children on to see if they would fight

translation.src_text: Mizè sé pa anyen ki dou
translation.tgt_text: Misery is not at all sweet

translation.src_text: Tibway-la ka fè kon moun ki enfim an tèt
translation.tgt_text: The boy is acting like a retarded person

translation.src_text: Mété sa andidan-an ban mwen
translation.tgt_text: Put this inside for me

translation.src_text: Sa ou-a mèyè pasé sa mwen-an
translation.tgt_text: Yours is better than mine

translation.src_text: Mwen ni pou fè on chay sakwifis pou mwen sa fè kay mwen
translation.tgt_text: I have to make a lot of sacrifice in order to be able to build my house

translation.src_text: Sa ka anpéché nou palé
translation.tgt_text: That prevents us from speaking

translation.src_text: Mal dan-an ja fè an lapsé
translation.tgt_text: The sore tooth has made an abscess

translation.src_text: Mwen kay fouté'w on bèl tap
translation.tgt_text: I'm going to give you a hard slap

translation.src_text: Tròk-la ka maché byen
translation.tgt_text: The truck works well

translation.src_text: I mété chapo-a asou tèt li èk i alé
translation.tgt_text: He put the hat on his head and he left

translation.src_text: Bon, monchè, mwen ka alé
translation.tgt_text: Well, my dear, I'm going

translation.src_text: Nou pa vlé sòti lè i ka fè nwè
translation.tgt_text: We don't want to go out when it's dark

translation.src_text: Nou wè dé chouval ka hédi kawòs-la
translation.tgt_text: We saw two horses pulling the buggy

translation.src_text: Yo mété tab-la an pant
translation.tgt_text: They leaned the table at a slant

translation.src_text: Madanm sala ni senk ich épi yo tout ni diféwan mannyè
translation.tgt_text: That woman has five children and they all have different ways

translation.src_text: Tan lontan mwen té ka viv adan an ti kay mé apwézan mwen ka viv adan an mézon
translation.tgt_text: Long ago I used to live in a little house but now I live in a nice house

translation.src_text: Denmou pwan nonm-lan èk i bwè tout san'y
translation.tgt_text: The Devil took the man and drank all his blood

translation.src_text: Yo kwiyé anlè Bondyé pou Bondyé té sa édé yo
translation.tgt_text: They called upon God to help them

translation.src_text: Mwen té la èk mwen vin wakonté sa ba'w
translation.tgt_text: I was there and I came to tell you that

translation.src_text: Nou ja li pasaj sala
translation.tgt_text: We have read that passage

translation.src_text: Anpami tout sé jenn jan-an, tifi sala ki pli bon dansè-a
translation.tgt_text: Among all the young folks, that girl is the best dancer

translation.src_text: Sé nonm-lan asid an lasal-la ka kozé
translation.tgt_text: The men were seated in the sitting room chatting

translation.src_text: I té vlé fè défans li menm douvan sé moun-an
translation.tgt_text: He wanted to defend himself before the people

translation.src_text: Konmézasyon zòt pa ka sanm konmézasyon manmay
translation.tgt_text: Your conversation doesn' t sound like the conversation of children

translation.src_text: Nonm sala enmen jiwé
translation.tgt_text: That man likes to curse

translation.src_text: Dimanch sala mwen kay konminyé
translation.tgt_text: This Sunday I will have communion

translation.src_text: I doubout an balkon-an ka kwiyé pwochen'y
translation.tgt_text: He stood on the balcony calling his neighbour

translation.src_text: I té faché tèlman i fouté tibway-la an koul baton
translation.tgt_text: He was so angry he struck the boy with a stick

translation.src_text: Poul-la ka kouvé asou sé zé-a
translation.tgt_text: The hen sits on the eggs

translation.src_text: I ka fè an chay bonté ban nou
translation.tgt_text: He does many good things for us

translation.src_text: I ka maché mòd kon on kanna
translation.tgt_text: He walks just like a duck

translation.src_text: Swifé fè-a apwé ou fin pasé
translation.tgt_text: Put tallow on the iron after you press

translation.src_text: I ka twavay wèd bay lizin-an
translation.tgt_text: He works hard for the factory

translation.src_text: Wétjen blan-an danjéwé an chay
translation.tgt_text: The white shark is very dangerous

translation.src_text: Mwen pa vlé alé wè kolonm-lan paski mwen pè i jawé mwen
translation.tgt_text: I don't want to go see the overseer because I am afraid he will shame me

translation.src_text: Lachè lézòm fèb
translation.tgt_text: Human flesh is weak

translation.src_text: Mwen pa sa sipòté ipokwizi nonm sala
translation.tgt_text: I cannot bear that man's hypocrisy

translation.src_text: Danm èk kavalyé ka dansé ansanm
translation.tgt_text: Women and men dance together

translation.src_text: Vwéman, sé kon sa i yé
translation.tgt_text: Really, that's the way it is

translation.src_text: Nou ni konfyans an Bondyé
translation.tgt_text: We have confidence in God

translation.src_text: Pyè maché asou'y
translation.tgt_text: Peter walked toward him

translation.src_text: Madanm-lan bouwi boujon gwiyav bay ti manmay-la pou doubout wilachman-an
translation.tgt_text: The lady boiled guava bud for the child to stop the diarrhoea

translation.src_text: Lè ou mété kalalou an bouyon, sé sa ki bon
translation.tgt_text: When you put callaloo in dumpling soup, it's really nice

translation.src_text: Sé péchè-a pèd kannòt yo an mové tan-an
translation.tgt_text: The fishermen lost their boat in the storm

translation.src_text: Lè ou twavèsé lawi-a ou kay wè'y
translation.tgt_text: When you cross the street you'll see it

translation.src_text: Ti manmay-la malad an chay épi manman'y fè an sòti ba li
translation.tgt_text: The child was quite sick and his mother visited an obeah man on his behalf

translation.src_text: Dachin-an tounen, i pa bon ankò
translation.tgt_text: The dasheen has turned, it's not good anymore

translation.src_text: San mwen-an gwo pasé sa ou-a
translation.tgt_text: Mine is bigger than yours

translation.src_text: I té tèlman hont lè yo di'y sa tifi'y-la fè
translation.tgt_text: She was so ashamed when they told her what her daughter had done

translation.src_text: Yo kouwi jis tan yo wivé an kat chimen-an
translation.tgt_text: They ran until they arrived at the crossroads

translation.src_text: Lèv li té ka senyen
translation.tgt_text: His lip was bleeding

translation.src_text: Yo konsilté épi nou avan yo alé
translation.tgt_text: They consulted us before they went

translation.src_text: Mwen kay pwété lajan-an an bank-lan pou fè kay-la
translation.tgt_text: I'll borrow the money from the bank to build the house

translation.src_text: I ka bwè dlo pis i ni otjèt
translation.tgt_text: He's drinking water because he has hiccups

translation.src_text: Zyé'w ka gadé dwòl
translation.tgt_text: Your eyes look strange

translation.src_text: Lè yo wè klèté-a, yo kwè i sété an étwal filé
translation.tgt_text: When they saw the light, they thought it was a falling star

translation.src_text: Yo gadé toupatou mé yo pa jwenn lajan-an
translation.tgt_text: They looked everywhere but they didn't find the money

translation.src_text: Sé moun sala ka fè jè tè
translation.tgt_text: Those people make clay jars

translation.src_text: Avan yo sové yo té ka péché tout tan-an
translation.tgt_text: Before they were saved they used to sin all the time

translation.src_text: Papa mwen sé on gwo tjò
translation.tgt_text: My father is a big shot

translation.src_text: Nonm sala dèdiké an chay an twavay li
translation.tgt_text: That man is quite dedicated to his work

translation.src_text: Yo p'òkò péyé lentéwé-a asou lajan-an yo pwété-a
translation.tgt_text: They haven't yet paid the interest on the money they borrowed

translation.src_text: I ka fè maji nwè
translation.tgt_text: He does black magic

translation.src_text: I pa menm di nou 'mèsi'
translation.tgt_text: He didn't even say 'thank you'

translation.src_text: Denmen nou kay pati
translation.tgt_text: Tomorrow we will depart

translation.src_text: I ka fè ajen
translation.tgt_text: He's fasting

translation.src_text: Madanm-lan té ka dékwiyé mawi'y douvan jij-la
translation.tgt_text: The wife was slandering her husband before the judge

translation.src_text: Paditan i té ka wévé i koumansé hélé
translation.tgt_text: While she was dreaming she began to yell

translation.src_text: Nou kay kwiyé asou Fwè Pyè pou pwédyé
translation.tgt_text: We will call on Brother Pierre to pray

translation.src_text: I pli ézé pou désann mòn pasé mouté
translation.tgt_text: It is easier to go down a hill than to go up it

translation.src_text: Yo té ka fè kay pay
translation.tgt_text: They used to make thatched-roof houses

translation.src_text: Jòdi-a ka fè cho
translation.tgt_text: It is hot today

translation.src_text: Yo ni katwiven dis dòla
translation.tgt_text: They have ninety dollars

translation.src_text: I kasé ponyèt li
translation.tgt_text: He broke his wrist

translation.src_text: Bondyé ka kité nou pwan chimen nou
translation.tgt_text: God allows us to do as we like

translation.src_text: La ni fant an kayè-a
translation.tgt_text: There are cracks on the rock

translation.src_text: Mwen vlé ou nétwayé la byen pwòp ban mwen
translation.tgt_text: I want you to tidy up there very clean for me

translation.src_text: Madanm-lan té ka pléwé tèlman lè mawi'y mò, pyèsonn pa té sa konfòté'y
translation.tgt_text: The woman cried so much when her husband died, nobody could comfort her

translation.src_text: I wifizé fè anyen
translation.tgt_text: He refused to do anything

translation.src_text: A laj di senk an yo voyé ti manmay-la lékòl
translation.tgt_text: At the age of five years they sent the child to school

translation.src_text: Nèg wonm pa ka ni lajan pis lè yo ni dé sou, yo ka bwè'y
translation.tgt_text: Drunkards don't have money because when they have a few cents, they drink it

translation.src_text: Koté ou alé, mwen dèyè'w
translation.tgt_text: Wherever you go, I'll find you

translation.src_text: Taya-a té ka mantjé van
translation.tgt_text: The tire was lacking air

translation.src_text: I té ka kouwi vant a tè
translation.tgt_text: He was running quickly

translation.src_text: Ay di entèl mwen bizwen koutla mwen
translation.tgt_text: Go tell so and so I need my cutlass

translation.src_text: Nonm-lan pwen yon minit dis kadè pou kouwi kous-la
translation.tgt_text: The man took one minute and ten seconds to run the race

translation.src_text: I pa vlé obéyi manman'y
translation.tgt_text: He doesn't want to obey his mother

translation.src_text: Mwen ja abandonnen jaden-an
translation.tgt_text: I've abandoned the garden

translation.src_text: Dènyé tibway li-a gaté pasé ki
translation.tgt_text: His last boy is quite spoiled

translation.src_text: I ka jwé bay an lòt tim
translation.tgt_text: He is playing for another team

translation.src_text: I kòviyé chenn-an
translation.tgt_text: He twisted the chain

translation.src_text: Gouté manjé-a; mwen asiwé ou kay kontan'y
translation.tgt_text: Taste the food; I'm sure you'll like it

translation.src_text: Lè nou alé an hòtè nou ka dòmi asou léponj
translation.tgt_text: When we go into the countryside we sleep on a foam

translation.src_text: Tibway sala endiskwé pasé ki; i ka mandé mwen zafè mwen
translation.tgt_text: That boy is so presumptuous; he is asking me my business

translation.src_text: Yo di biswi sèl bon pou van
translation.tgt_text: They say saltines are good for gas

translation.src_text: Lè bonm-lan pété ou kay konnèt ki sa ki ka alé-a
translation.tgt_text: When the news breaks you will know what is going on

translation.src_text: Syèl-la té kouvè èk nwaj
translation.tgt_text: The sky was covered with clouds

translation.src_text: Ni chouval-la ni kawòs-la tonbé an lanmè-a
translation.tgt_text: Both the horse and the cart fell into the sea

translation.src_text: Nou ni twa patizan politik Sent Lisi
translation.tgt_text: We have three political parties in Saint Lucia

translation.src_text: I visé'y séwé
translation.tgt_text: He screwed it tight

translation.src_text: La pa ni pyès diféwans épi Bondyé, menm si ou blan ében nwè
translation.tgt_text: There's no difference with God, whether you are white or black

translation.src_text: Nou wè on bétjin lè nou té an dlo-a kon sa nou kouwi sòti an dlo-a
translation.tgt_text: We saw a barracuda when we were in the water so we got out quickly

translation.src_text: I kasé koudbwa'y
translation.tgt_text: He broke his elbow

translation.src_text: Sé ti manmay-la bwilé kay-la lè yo té ka jwé èk zalimèt-la
translation.tgt_text: The children burnt down the house wh en they were playing with matches

translation.src_text: Nou tann nouvèl-la asou radyo-a
translation.tgt_text: We heard the news on the radio

translation.src_text: Nou ja apwann lison nou
translation.tgt_text: We've learned our lesson

translation.src_text: Mwen pa ni abilité-a pou fè kalité twavay sala
translation.tgt_text: I don't have the ability to do this kind of work

translation.src_text: Kalé pat fig sala ban mwen
translation.tgt_text: Peel those bananas for me

translation.src_text: Fig ka taché had nou
translation.tgt_text: Bananas stain our clothes

translation.src_text: Madanm mwen pwan on lòk sèt jou apwé i akouché
translation.tgt_text: My wife took a purge seven days after she gave birth

translation.src_text: Yo ka vann téwen sala
translation.tgt_text: They're selling that plot of land

translation.src_text: Moun ka vann chennèt tout bò lawi-a
translation.tgt_text: People are selling akees all along the road

translation.src_text: Pa jwé épi tibway sala; i kotjen an chay
translation.tgt_text: Don't play with that boy; he is such a cheater

translation.src_text: Sé moun-an ka nwèsi non sé lézòt-la
translation.tgt_text: The people were slandering the others

translation.src_text: Jis sé madanm-lan ki alé wè sé manmay-la jwé bol
translation.tgt_text: Even the women went to see the children playing cricket

translation.src_text: Nou pèd ti vis sala
translation.tgt_text: We lost that little screw

translation.src_text: Pyé bwa-a mò èk tout fèy li tonbé
translation.tgt_text: The tree died and all of its leaves fell

translation.src_text: Yo té ni pou péyé an chay lajan pou chaloup nèf yo
translation.tgt_text: They had to pay a lot of money for their new yacht

translation.src_text: Sak-la pézé yan san liv
translation.tgt_text: The sack weights one hundred pounds

translation.src_text: I té vlé mèt-la fè'y an kolonm mé i pa ni kapasité-a pou sa
translation.tgt_text: He wanted the boss to make him an overseer but he doesn't have the capacity for that

translation.src_text: Yè mwen manjé douz tig
translation.tgt_text: Yesterday I ate twelve tigers

translation.src_text: Mwen ni on bonm menm pawèy èk sala
translation.tgt_text: I have a bucket just like that one

translation.src_text: Misyé-a wivé èk sa ki té pawé alé épi'y
translation.tgt_text: The man arrived and whoever was ready went with him

translation.src_text: Nou sipozé sèvi Bondyé
translation.tgt_text: We should serve God

translation.src_text: Lanmè-a bas; ou ka wè tout sé lébiché-a asou kay-la
translation.tgt_text: The tide is low; you can see all of the sea fans on the reef

translation.src_text: Nonm sala sé on gògè
translation.tgt_text: That man's a drunkard

translation.src_text: I di kon sa i kay vini denmen
translation.tgt_text: He said that he will come tomorrow

translation.src_text: An chay moun kontan tanmawen fwans paski i pa si kon lòt tanmawen-an
translation.tgt_text: Many people like tanmawen fwans because it's not sour like other tamarinds

translation.src_text: Sa sé antansyon mwen
translation.tgt_text: That's my intention

translation.src_text: Mwen ni an bèl bag dajan
translation.tgt_text: I have a beautiful silver ring

translation.src_text: Nou tout sé manm gwoup sala
translation.tgt_text: We're all members of that group

translation.src_text: Bouché-a débité bèf-la
translation.tgt_text: The butcher butchered the cow

translation.src_text: Viv lavi'w kon on moun ki matwité
translation.tgt_text: Live your life like a person who is mature

translation.src_text: Ogannizasyon-an sala ka wépwézanté tout twavayè an péyi-a
translation.tgt_text: This organization represents all of the workers in the country

translation.src_text: Twèl sala twò étwèt pou mwen sa fè anyen épi'y
translation.tgt_text: That cloth is too narrow for me to do anything with it

translation.src_text: Sé an lòfèb ki fè tout sé bèl chenn sala
translation.tgt_text: It was a goldsmith who made all of these nice chains

translation.src_text: Maho ka fè bèl mèb
translation.tgt_text: Mahogany makes nice furniture

translation.src_text: Yo ni an chay malè
translation.tgt_text: They have lots of bad luck

translation.src_text: Kay-la té pentiwé an jòn
translation.tgt_text: The house was painted yellow

translation.src_text: Yo té ka bwè twòp diven èk yo vini sou
translation.tgt_text: They were drinking too much wine and they got drunk

translation.src_text: Yo pentiwé kay-la an blan
translation.tgt_text: They painted the house white

translation.src_text: Mwen kontan pwan lòdè lansan
translation.tgt_text: I like to take the smell of incense

translation.src_text: Sa ou ka di-a sé papicho
translation.tgt_text: What you are saying is foolishness

translation.src_text: Apantè ka sèvi poto fè
translation.tgt_text: Surveyors use iron pegs

translation.src_text: Sé pou lapéti néglijans dòktè-a ti manmay-la mò
translation.tgt_text: It was because of the negligence of the doctor the child died

translation.src_text: Mwen konyen lapòt-la mé pyèsonn wéponn
translation.tgt_text: I knocked on the door but nobody answered

translation.src_text: Ou an dwa mété yo dòwò asou tè-a
translation.tgt_text: You have the right to kick them off of the land

translation.src_text: Yo mété lapen-an an kalòj-la
translation.tgt_text: They put the rabbit in the cage

translation.src_text: Mwen kay kouvè kay mwen-an épi galvanniz
translation.tgt_text: I am going to cover my house with corrugated galvanized roofing

translation.src_text: Sé moun sala sé moun ki pli mizéwab
translation.tgt_text: Those people are the most miserable sort

translation.src_text: Madanm sala soutiwèz, sé li ki annékòz tifi-a gwo bouden
translation.tgt_text: That lady is a meddler, sh e's the reason the girl is pregnant

translation.src_text: Yo bwilé bonda Tig èk an fè cho
translation.tgt_text: They burnt Tiger's buttocks with a hot iron

translation.src_text: I pa ka twavay kon i dwé
translation.tgt_text: He doesn't work like he should

translation.src_text: Nou manjé manjé-a san salézon
translation.tgt_text: We ate the food without meat
